ch.hsr.i.jvector.ui.universe
Class Universe

java.lang.Object
  ch.hsr.i.jvector.ui.universe.Universe

public class Universe
extends java.lang.Object

An implementation of the scenegraph, providing methods to get a views of this scene, add and remove elements at runtime from and to the scene.

Method Detail

getCanvas3D

public javax.media.j3d.Canvas3D getCanvas3D(java.lang.String perspective)
Callback to allow a Canvas3D to be added to a Panel. This method allows the Canvas3D to be added to its parent GUI components. If the canvas at the specified index does not exist the first one is returned.

Parameters:
the - index of the canvas you'd like to get
